data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Updates - Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process  (CIRP)
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Committee of Creditors (CoC) has approved the Liquidation of the Company in accordance with the provisions of section 33 of the IBC. An Application for initiation of Liquidation has laready been filed before the honble NCLT and the adjudication of the said application is currently pending.
